Description: Query gene feature information for the organism of interest
Pros: gene ID conversion, biotype and coordinate information

Description: Transcript and gene-level information directly fetched from Ensembl API (similar to TxDb, but with filtering ability and versioned by Ensembl release)
Pros: easy functions to extract features, direct filtering
Cons: Not the most up-to-date annotations, more difficult to use than some packages

Description: UCSC database for transcript and gene-level information or can create own *TxDb* from an SQLite database file using the *GenomicFeatures* package
Pros: feature information, easy functions to extract features
Cons: only available current and recent genome builds - can create your own, less up-to-date with annotations than Ensembl

Description: Gene-level feature information immediately available for the human and model organisms
Pros: super quick and easy gene ID conversion, biotype and coordinate information

Description: An R package version of the Ensembl [BioMart online tool](http://www.ensembl.org/biomart/martview/70dbbbe3f1c5389418b5ea1e02d89af3)
Pros: all Ensembl database information available, all organisms on Ensembl, wealth of information
